WVW_SCORE_HELP:
**__WvW Score__**

`!match` - Show interactive match results in an embed, looks nicer but may not work well on mobile
`!score` - Show the scores of your current WvW match-up.
`!relscore` - Show the overall WvW score of the top world, along with the differences with the worlds on the second and the third place.
`!kd` - Show the kill/death ratio of your current WvW match-up.
WVWSCORE_EMBED_FOOTER: Click the reactions below to refresh or view specific maps.
WVWSCORE_EMBED_UPDATE_ERROR: Sorry, there was a problem updating the scores, please try again later.
WVWSCORE_EMBED_REACTION_ERROR: Unable to remove reaction, you will need to hit the button twice to use it again.
WVWSCORE_ERROR: Sorry, the score could not be determined at this time.
